GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_ASKALLOWPERSADS: Would you allow showing personalized ads to you?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_ASKALLOWPERSADSEXPL: This will make ads more relevant and it won't bother you (you can watch it only when you want to receive a reward in the game)
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_BACKUPSEXPLANATION: Backup lets you store and revert your current game world, while it has no effect on the currencies which are linked to your account (Rubies)
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_BREAKCODE: Guess the code to get your weekly gift
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_FINDHINTS: Find the hints inside the game or...
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_GETMORECODESINDISCORD: Get more codes in our Discord
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_INF_USEMARKET_BEG: Consider selling some resources at the
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_MAKEBACKUPS: You can backup your tower to load it later
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_PENDINGMSG: Thank you for making purchase! When the transaction completes processing, the purchase will become available
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_RATEGAME: Could you, please, leave a public review to let more people find the game?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_REWARD2TESTER: During the development we have changed the game core, so, you have fresh start. But we give you a boost to regain your progress faster
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_SMALLQUESTION: I want to ask you one small question...
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_TELLWHY: Would you, please, suggest some ways how to make it enjoyable?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_THANKS2TESTER: Thank you so much for being the very first tester of this game!
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CAP_WOULDYOULIKE2BUY: Would you like to buy more?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CODEERR_ALREADYUSED: You have already used this code
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CODEERR_EXPIRED: This code has expired or not yet active
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CODEERR_NOEFFECT: At the current game state the code will not have any effect. Please, try again later
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CODEERR_ONLYNUMBERS: Code must have only numbers and latin letters
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CODEERR_WRONGPLAYER: This gift is for another player

GROUP_general_interface.TXID_CODEERR_WRONGWORLD: This code is for another game world (maybe)
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_DISCORDSUGGESTIONS: You can check the results and current suggestions in our community
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_GDPR_APPLE_ADD_ALT: As you continue you will be able to select your tracking preferences
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_GDPR_EXPLANATION: The game uses the players data (ads cookies and usage statistics) to enhance the gameplay and serve relevant ads to stay free. Please, accept our terms of use and privacy policy (or let your legal guardian agree if you are below the age of consent)
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_LASTLOADATTEMPT: Last time there was an error
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSGCAP_CREDITSAUTHORS: Game by Airapport team Alexey Izvalov & Nadiia Serbina Â© 2020 All rights reserved
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSGCAP_NEXTRUNBOOSTS: On the next run you'll have such boosts
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSGCAP_RESTART_BOOST_CAP: You have the following boosts now:
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSGCAP_RESTART_QUESTION: Do you really want to restart the building?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSGCAP_VICTORY: Victory! You reached the highest designed level! You can keep building beyond this limit, or play other games by Airapport
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_CLIPBOARD: Text file was copied to clipboard. You can store it somewhere or email to yourself to be able to restore the tower
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_GAINMOREAFTERADS: Would you like to gain more after watching ads
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_GAINMOREGAINSEXPL: (only gains, not spends, will be doubled)?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_GAINMORESKIPADS: Would you like to gain more (without ads)?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_HOWTOIMPROVE: Suggestions how to improve the game
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_MUSTIMPORTFROMCLIPBOARD: Before importing please select the save text string and copy it to clipboard
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_NOTASAVETEXT: The file you copied to clipboards is not a proper save file
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_REWARD_READY: You have received an unexpected gift! Check, what it is
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_SLOTTAKENCONFIRM: This slot is already taken. Do you really want to rewrite it?
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_SORRYSAVE: Sorry, we were unable to load the save
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_TEXTAFTERSCREENSHOTOK: Now the players' community can admire your achievement
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_WRONGSAVEOPTIONS: Here is what you can do before restarting the game:
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_MSG_YOUCANREVERT2BACKUP: If you want, you can roll back to the previous save
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_PHRASE_ARTIFACTS_END: artifacts. Check if you can buy more
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_SAVEDATA: Appreciate your help! This is your save data. Please, select it all (long press -> select all), copy (long press -> copy) and send in email to the developer: general@cardswar.com
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_SEND: Looks like the game crashed last time. You can try loading this save again or send the data to the developer. We will look at it and fix as soon as possible. You can also completely restart the game if you don't want to wait
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_SEND_COPIEDSAVEDATA: The text with your save data was copied to clipboard. Please, send in email to the developer: general@cardswar.com
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_SEND_SAVEDATA: Please, send it by email to the developer: general@cardswar.com
GROUP_general_interface.TXID_VOTERESULT: Thank you! You vote has been accounted.

GROUP_tower_game_elements.TXID_WORLDDESC_BABELTOWER: Build the tower to the sky and beyond!

GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_BERTH: Attracts tourists on flying machines and earns money
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_BRICKSSTORAGE: Stores Bricks. Bricks can be sold from it
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_CANNON: Shoots bricks to the upper floors of the Tower
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_CARAWANSARAI: Buys your goods at a good price
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_CRANE: Brings bricks to the higher levels of the Tower
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_DRUMMER: Creates the rhythm for the faster work of the transporter
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_ELEPHANT: Transports much more stone than human
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_FIELD: Grows grass to feed the elephant
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_FOREST: Source of Wood. Can be depleted. Grows slowly, faster if gets water
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_GALILEO: Drops apples from the balcony, looks how they fall and generates Science
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_GEMSLAB: Explore underground and looks for valuable gems
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_GOODUFO: Transports stone using the most advanced technology
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_HELICOPTER: Explodes the rock to mine more stone
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_HELICOPTERBALCONY: Place to refuel and reload the helicopter
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_IRRIGATOR: Boosts grass production from the Field
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_LUMBERBRMAKER: Uses alien technology to convert planks into bricks
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_MOONSTONETOWER: Creates additional bricks if it is higher than the building level
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_MOONSWING: Decreases the price of the Moon tower growth
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_PLANKSSTORAGE: Stores Planks. Planks can be sold from it
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_PROPAGANDA: Inspires workers to work more efficiently while active. Requires various resources to operate
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_PUMP: Pumps water from the Well automatically
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_QUARRYSTORAGE: Stores Stone. Stone can be sold from it
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_SPACEHIVE: Charges the drones which fly and click the machines
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_SPACEPORTAL: Teleports asteroids from the orbit to let you sell them
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_SPUTNIK: Generates science as the sattelite rotates around the planet
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_STARS: Not just dots in the sky
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_SUNBATTERY: Sends energy to a specific facility
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_TELESCOPE: Looks at the stars and generates Science
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_UFOBASE: Recharges the UFO to get it ready for the next flight faster
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_WATERWELL: Contains Water. Can be depleted. Restores water inside by itself (faster when it's raining)
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_WOODSTORAGE: Stores Wood. Wood can be sold from it
GROUP_tower_machines.TXID_MACH_DESC_ZEPPELIN: Travels from faraway to see your magnificent tower

GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_AUTOCLICKER: You might want to place the autoclicker on one object or another, depending on which one currently needs additional power the most.
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_AUTOTRANSFERSTONE: Tap the Storage to start transferring the stone to the Saw
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_AUTOTRANSFERWOOD: Tap the Storage to start transferring the Wood to the Lumbermill
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_CHOP: Tap the Forest to chop wood. Chopping will go on automatically
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_CRANE: Just tap on it and it will start working much faster.
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_CRANENEEDED: We need a crane to build higher tower
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_CRANE_CAP: Did you know that you can speed up the crane?
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_DRAGWATER: Tap the Water Well to bring Water to the Forest to grow new trees
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_HIGHTOWERMOREBRICKS: Higher tower stories need much more bricks
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_LAB_CAP: Soon you will have enough science to buy a laboratory!
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_LAB_SCROLL: It will be located in the basement of your tower. It has very powerful upgrades for your future progress
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_LUMBERMILL: Tap the lumbermill to produce desks quicker. Work will go on automatically
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_MARKET: You can sell resources at the market
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_MINE: Tap the Quarry to mine Stone. Mining will go on automatically
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_MINEMORE: Mine more stone to continue the cycle
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_MORERESTART: Because Golden Bricks boost 3 game parameters: production, clicker power and market prices, their effect is huge. It's a good moment now to restart your building to gain more Golden Bricks
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_MORERESTART_CAP: Gaining Golden Bricks is essential for tower building
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_PRODUCEBRICKS: Tap the tent to produce bricks quicker. Work will go on automatically
GROUP_tower_tutorial.TXID_MSGCAP_TUT_RESTART: Check which bonuses will you gain if you restart the building

GROUP_tower_upgrades.TXID_UPGRNAME_RESTARTGB: Additional Golden Bricks bonus after restart
GROUP_tower_upgrades.TXID_UPGRNAME_TIMECLICKERBOTS: Time of work of a single charge
GROUP_tower_upgrades.TXID_UPGRNAME_UFONUMFLIGHT: Number of transports on a single charge

GROUP_www_airapport_games.TXID_GAMEDESC_IDLETOWERBUILDER: Build the tower to the sky and beyond!
